results.title: [Treatment of primary hyperlipoproteinemias type IV with different biguanides (author's transl)].
results.text_hl: In 12 patients with primary @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_IV</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006953 @@@type IV hyperlipoproteinemia@@@ the @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ lowering effect of constant doses of the @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanides@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Phenformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010629 @@@phenformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Buformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002026 @@@buformin@@@ was compared.

citations.NLM: Weisweiler P, Schwandt P. [Treatment of primary hyperlipoproteinemias type IV with different biguanides (author's transl)]. Klin Wochenschr. 1976 Mar 15;54(6):283-5. PMID: 177803
